Sentencas: The design of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) using biogas for distributed power generation is a promising alternative to reduce greenhouse gas emissions in the energy and waste man-agement sectors.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biogas systems producing hydrogen and electricity with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the high efficiency of SOFCs in conjunction with the pos-sibility to produce hydrogen may be a financially attractive option for biogas plants.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biogas systems producing hydrogen and electricity with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the influence of design variables in the optimization of revenues and efficiency has seldom been studied for these novel cogeneration systems.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biogas systems producing hydrogen and electricity with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, in order to fulfill this knowledge gap, a multi-objective optimization problem using the NSGA-II algorithm is proposed to evaluate optimal solutions for systems producing hydrogen and electricity from biogas.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biogas systems producing hydrogen and electricity with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, a mixed-integer linear optimization routine is used to ensure an efficient heat recovery system with minimal number of heat exchanger units.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biogas systems producing hydrogen and electricity with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that hydrogen production with a fuel cell downstream is able to achieve high exergy efficiencies (65-66%) and a drastic improvement in net present value (1346%) compared with sole power generation.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biogas systems producing hydrogen and electricity with solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Despite the additional equipment, the investment costs are estimated to be quite similar (12% increase) to conventional steam reforming systems and the levelized cost of hydrogen is very competitive (2.27 USD/kgH2).(c) 2021
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biogas systems producing hydrogen and electricity with solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: Multi-objective optimization of biogas systems producing hydrogen and electricity with solid oxide fuel cells
